content.question: For which of the following reasons is Pliny’s father not mentioned in the passage?

choices.label: His father had abandoned the family.
His father had died when he was young.
His uncle was of a higher social class than his father.
His uncle, after his parents divorced, married his mother.

content.answer: His father had died when he was young.
